title: (x) DC Comics' The Losers masthead - (similar to) Quagmire {Mike K, Mike Y, Yves}
content:
Take a look at this link and check out the Title font. "The Losers" is this a font?   
   
 [http://www.dccomics.com/features/losers/](http://web.archive.org/web/20070908123059/http:/www.dccomics.com/features/losers/)   
   
ThanX,   
Kojo

 [‹ (x) elegant script M - ITC Edwardian Script {Yves}](http://web.archive.org/web/20070908123059/http:/typophile.com/node/10186 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Sign & Graphic Solutions Made Simple - ITC Eras {James} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070908123059/http:/typophile.com/node/10175 "Go to next forum topic")
author: planetkojo

comments.content: Almost certainly designed by [Rian Hughes](http://web.archive.org/web/20070908123059/http:/typographi.com/000964.php), possibly custom.

Yeah, I thought it might be Hughes. He's been doing other work for them on another title calle "The Intimates".   
   
ThanX for the help,   
Kojo

Looks to be a variation of Rian's Quagmire Black Italic   
   
Thanx again!

It's similar to Quagmire Extended Bold Italic (Rian Hughes). I'm sure you've got it Yves. See sample ![QuagmireExtendedLosers.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20070908123059im_/http:/www.typophile.com/cgibin/board-post.pl?action=posting_upload_form&what=show&img=69096)

Hahaha, I found out myself just a second ago and was going   
to post it. Well done, Mike! ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20070908123059im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
